extendedInfo.description: ... You're about to discover what is simply the only App capable of feeding the intense passion of real Katy Perry fans worldwide...If you think those screenshots look amazing, just wait until you open your app and dive right into the glorious action.You can now take Katy Perry everywhere you go with FREE instant access right at your fingertips.This stunning app goes above and beyond the standards of other apps to deliver everything you could ever wish for as a true Katy Perry fan all in one place.Just look at what we have put together just for you:News, Blog posts, Interviews and Media Pics updated and sent to your app in real time as and when it happens so you're always the first to know and never miss a beat on whats happening in the wonderful world of Katy Perry...Follow all Katy's Social Media activities with live feeds to her on Facebook and Twitter...Relive all your favorite Katy Perry moments with access to amazing videos and a stunning photo gallery with cover art, video stills and live on stage pics.Think you know all the words to your favorite Katy Perry Tracks? Here's your chance to prove it! Katy Perry Radio streams some of your hearts most cherished Katy Perry tracks with lyrics all in one...Customize your phone with one of 10 vibrant Katy Perry wallpapers...And much much more... If you are a Real Katy Perry Fan...Download your FREE Katy Perry App Now...It was made especially for you! Download your FREE Katy Perry App Now...This app is not endorsed by, or affiliated with Katy Perry, any of the fansites featured and/ or any of Katy Perry's record Lables.
